metadata.name: Elephant's Tail
metadata.description:
An African elephant tail on the hand of a member of Zambia's special anti-poaching unit (SAPU). The confiscated tail was taken from poachers operating near Kafue National Park in Zambia, Africa.

Despite increased efforts, and the presence of SAPU members, this anti-poaching unit still requires additionally resources to combat poaching occurrences that target elephants that use Itezhi-Tezhi lake as a watering hole. 

~

This NFT was made with permission from SAPU and is part of the Bear Witness collection, a curated body of work exploring the inseparable link between people and planet through the convergence of art and the documentary approach.

A percentage of this NFT sale will go towards Game Rangers International.
